quote: My faith isn't very churchy, it's a pretty personal, intimate thing and has been a huge source of strength in moments of life and death.
author: Bear Grylls

quote: I played volleyball, basketball, softball, and I started to love soccer the most around 7-8 years old because it was a physical game. I could use my speed and strength to my advantage.
author: Alex Morgan

quote: Our firm conviction that ours is a just cause and that we must find a peaceful way to attain our goals gave us the strength and the awareness of the limits beyond which we must not go.
author: Lech Walesa

quote: Once you have speech, you don't have to wait for natural selection! If you want more strength, you build a stealth bomber; if you don't like bacteria, you invent penicillin; if you want to communicate faster, you invent the Internet. Once speech evolved, all of human life changed.
author: Tom Wolfe

quote: My strength is looking for composition and light, and I think those things come in the quieter times of war or photographing people affected on the margins of war - civilians, refugees; that is where I really excel.
author: Lynsey Addario

quote: I have a condition called Osteogenesis Imperfecta (OI), which has affected my growth and bone strength. In short, people with the kind of OI I have generally experience hundreds of fractures in their lifetime and use wheelchairs for mobility.
author: Stella Young

quote: Israel is the strongest nation in the Middle East, but we have to apply our strength wisely.
author: Ehud Barak

quote: In the strength of the Lord we can do and endure and overcome all things.
author: David A. Bednar

quote: Now we have technology where we can modify the genomics of individuals by gene transfer and genetic meddling, we may find that people will want to modify their children, enhance their intelligence, their strength and their beauty and all the other so-called desirable characteristics.
author: Robert Winston

quote: America is best when we come together with clear leadership, expertise, and the political will to take on difficult challenges and get things done. No one should ever doubt the strength and resilience of our country and our democracy.
author: Jamie Dimon

quote: I will not retreat I will find the strength to reach my goal.
author: Henrikh Mkhitaryan

quote: President Obama's record on national security is a tribute to his strength, and judgment, and to his preference for inclusion and partnership over partisanship.
author: William J. Clinton

quote: I think I've had the longest career of strength, focus, and still being able to sell records. I think I'm that guy. I'm still blessed with the opportunity to make music and pass out a message like, 'Life is good,' to the world.
author: Nas

quote: All my life, since the time I was little, has been a long distraction. At least that is the way some people want to perceive it, but for me, it's given me a lot of strength.
author: Hope Solo

quote: Americans have always prized individuality - it is part of our national DNA - but America is a community that draws strength from the sum of our people and has always known that the total of that sum is worth far more than its individual parts.
author: Evan Bayh

quote: America's strength has made it a sort of Gulliver in world affairs: By wiggling its toes it can, often inadvertently, break the arm of a Lilliputian.
author: Mohsin Hamid

quote: I'm adding moves to my post game. I'm really working on staying low. I'm working on my strength overall, especially my legs. That's going to help me defensively as well.
author: Kristaps Porzingis

quote: Your identity is firmly anchored in Christ's accomplishment, not yours; his strength, not yours; his performance, not yours; his victory, not yours.
author: Tullian Tchividjian

quote: God wants to free us from ourselves, and there's nothing like suffering to show us that we need something bigger than our abilities and our strength and our explanations.
author: Tullian Tchividjian

quote: I am deeply honored by the trust the board has placed in me to lead Duke Energy. I have a high degree of confidence in the strength of our company's leadership and dedicated employees.
author: Lynn Good

quote: The strength of 'Peep Show' has always been that that it's quite traditional, but it's obviously presented in a very new way.
author: Robert Webb

quote: Everyone deals with loss. I'm no different, but we all find our ways of coming through things. Is it tough? Of course, but you find the strength to push on through.
author: Carlene Carter

quote: You can be in love and raise a family wonderfully by not being married, but actually, marriage does give us a strength, because it's quite hard to get out of, and so it makes us fight more to keep it together. If divorce becomes dead easy - which it sort of has - then we don't have that backup. Because, for everybody, relationships are hard.
author: Jeremy Irons

quote: To burn the ideal of a great love into the soul of youth in letters of fire - that is to give him a real moral strength.
author: Ellen Key

quote: It is not a dream that someday, nations will be able to settle their difficulties without war, just as individuals now settle their personal feuds without resorting to arguments of physical strength or sharp steel. For, then, humanity will have created international jurisdiction and a power to enforce its laws.
author: Ellen Key

quote: The Japanese bureaucracy is unique. It is also very powerful, although it is now the object of so much criticism. Many of Japan's brightest made it a pillar of strength and continuity.
author: F. Sionil Jose

quote: I always say that women are very strong and men are powerful. But beauty gives you both strength and power. I never think of it. It's just one of those natural things. It's the only thing I know how to do.
author: Alber Elbaz

quote: If I wanted to have total control and be a dictator, I would do ice sculpture in my basement. If I want to make a movie, I'm going to work with 500 people, and I will have to work with their strength and their weakness.
author: Denis Villeneuve

quote: I'm a very slow screenwriter. It takes time for me to write a screenplay. Also, I feel it's not my strength.
author: Denis Villeneuve

quote: It's always difficult to play a scene of physical violence because you're always afraid that you don't know your own strength and might hurt someone.
author: Catherine Deneuve

quote: I think naturally, if you're an actor, there's a high level of assertiveness that you need to have to survive this business. There's boldness in being assertive, and there's strength and confidence.
author: Bryan Cranston

quote: The potential strength of female friendship and the bonds that can be formed, especially over a lifelong relationship, is very profound.
author: Toni Collette

quote: My story is really an affirmation of my strength and my luck. To live with a great artist like Ted Hughes or Mick Jagger is a very, very destructive role for a woman trying to be herself. In fact, it can't be done.
author: Marianne Faithfull

quote: With speed skating, it's like doing one-legged squats over and over again, with that one leg absorbing more than 80 percent of your weight. It takes an enormous amount of strength, and you're in such a weird position.
author: Apolo Ohno

quote: I guess, as a reporter, I always thought that my biggest strength was that I could get anybody to talk to me. I wasn't the best writer, but I could get people to talk to me.
author: Jose Antonio Vargas

quote: We can have enhanced devolution - greater powers in Scotland - but within the strength, security and stability of the United Kingdom, and I think that's what most Scots want.
author: Douglas Alexander

quote: I believe in peace through strength.
author: Chris Gibson

quote: I believe that the strength in America is individual families and communities.
author: Chris Gibson

quote: Turing was fearless. He's extremely direct, which can be seen as socially awkward, and that becomes both his big obstacle but also, in many ways, his strength.
author: Morten Tyldum

quote: It's a controversial issue: many feminists reasonably worry that by taking the concentration off gender as an independent locus of oppression, we dilute the strength of a women's movement, or of women's rights advocacy.
author: Rebecca Traister

quote: Jimmy Fallon's strengths are that he's fun, and he's good at impressions, and he's musically inclined. And my strength is that I'm a joke writer, but I also have no filter, and I think that that's not a talent per se, but it's just a thing about myself that I have found that people like about what I do.
author: Nikki Glaser

quote: There is a strength of character in the people who have, by and large, never experienced comfort.
author: Sean Penn

quote: In America, now, let us - Christian, Jew, Muslim, agnostic, atheist, wiccan, whatever - fight nativism with the same strength and conviction that we fight terrorism. My faith calls on its followers to love one's enemies. A tall order, that - perhaps the tallest of all.
author: Jon Meacham

quote: I realized a while back that I have an innate ability to be compassionate, and I saw that the strength of compassion is something that healers have and healers use.'
author: Ricky Williams

quote: I want to thank all my fans, teammates, coaches and supporters for the strength they've given me to overcome so much.
author: Ricky Williams

quote: The lack of financial strength to avail healthcare is a major challenge.
author: N. R. Narayana Murthy

quote: I shall try and effect all that is before me to perform; and God, I think, will surely give me strength for His work so long as He directs my line of duty.
author: Dorothea Dix

quote: All the sudden high-impact stress can really take a toll on your body. So if you still want to be active and get in a good workout, go to a yoga class or pilates class, or get in some strength and conditioning.
author: Sophia Bush

quote: Spend the first six to 12 months building a great product or service that people love, rather than chasing investors. When the time comes to engage investors, you will be meeting them from a position of strength. This makes all the difference.
author: Aileen Lee

quote: The strength of the dollar has historically been tied to the strength of the U.S. economy and the faith that investors have in doing business in America.
author: Steve Mnuchin

quote: To the extent the dollar gains strength relative to other currencies, assets priced in those other currencies would become cheaper on a dollar basis.
author: Steve Mnuchin

quote: I think my best skill in this whole deal is as a conduit to try to bring people together, because I think it's in our unity that we'll have the greatest strength.
author: Woody Harrelson

quote: But I really like hosting, I think it's a strength of mine. It allows me to improvise, and I love the spontaneity of that, and I think I'm funny behind the desk when interviewing someone.
author: Garry Shandling

quote: Some say that I should settle down, go slower and not push so hard, so quickly for such transformational change. To them, I say that you misunderstand the size of the problems we face, the strength of the status quo and the urgency of the people's desire for change.
author: Eliot Spitzer

quote: Vocally, I have learned to find my strength, and my voice has developed a lot since 'Be Here.' I learned to sing with all of my body.
author: Rachel Platten

quote: A man has to have sensibility, wit, mystery, tolerance, and strength... Romance also helps.
author: Carolina Herrera

quote: To be loved is a strength. To love is a weakness.
author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quote: Japan today has become acquainted with the Western civilization of the rule of Might, but retains the characteristics of the Oriental civilization of the rule of Right. Now the question remains whether Japan will be the hawk of the Western civilization of the rule of Might, or the tower of strength of the Orient.
author: Sun Yat-sen

quote: I do a dance-based cardio workout infused with circuit training, and emphasizing strength and alignment.
author: Chloe Sevigny

quote: I challenge anybody to say that I wouldn't know how to approach foreign policy because, unlike some of the other people, I at least have a foreign policy philosophy, which is an extension of the Reagan philosophy. Peace through strength, and my philosophy is peace through strength and clarity.
author: Herman Cain

quote: I admire President Chavez for his strength to resist the United States. Instead, Bush is waging a war of terrorism against the world.
author: Cindy Sheehan

quote: My strength as a TV writer was my total lack of interest in television.
author: Maria Semple

quote: Touch is more important than arm strength. You want to really allow the receiver to run underneath the throw. It'll give you a little margin for error if you undershoot it a bit.
author: Aaron Rodgers

quote: I think the biggest difference is that I've noticed Western parents seem much more concerned about their children's psyches, their self-esteem, whereas tough immigrant parents assume strength rather than fragility in their children and therefore behave completely differently.
author: Amy Chua

quote: We are still keeping, as much as we can to the one million commitment that we made, hoping that at a certain point in time, the headwinds represented by the strength of the yen will be a little bit less strong.
author: Carlos Ghosn

quote: Not one man in a thousand has the strength of mind or the goodness of heart to be an atheist.
author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: I wanted Puma to regain strength with the existing logo rather than try to get rid of the past.
author: Jochen Zeitz

quote: The puma... the cat... is not just about power and speed and strength... but it is also a very elegant animal. That's what we've tried to reflect in our products.
author: Jochen Zeitz

quote: We like to think that a free market's greatest strength is its self-corrective nature.
author: Nina Easton

quote: If my strength is technology, financial structuring is my son's skill.
author: Baba Kalyani

quote: I reserve the right to survey the national political landscape for candidates at all levels who reflect a proper understanding of our national security, economic security, and family security - the ideals of social conservation, the heart and strength of our country.
author: Jeff Fortenberry

quote: I stopped thinking too much about what could happen and relied on my physical and mental strength to play the right shots at the right time.
author: Novak Djokovic

quote: Dealing with depression effectively is a mark not of weakness, but of strength.
author: Andrew Solomon

quote: All too often arrogance accompanies strength, and we must never assume that justice is on the side of the strong. The use of power must always be accompanied by moral choice.
author: Theodore Bikel

quote: Europe has a lot of strength. We need to pool that strength, and I am very much in favour of that - more of a deeper political union.
author: George Papandreou

quote: The fact that we're going through a crisis is an opportunity for Europe to be more coordinated and more integrated. We're actually talking about a European Monetary Fund or euro bonds, about guarantees for countries, about economic governance in the European Union. That shows the strength of Europe.
author: George Papandreou

quote: Academics don't normally manage to alter people's way of thinking through their strength of argument.
author: David Crystal

quote: I don't think a woman has to act like a man to show that she has strength.
author: Little Richard

quote: It is a maudlin and indecent verity that comes out through the strength of wine.
author: Joseph Conrad

quote: Whenever I see John Lewis, I invariably say, 'Thank you.' And I will never stop. I don't know how he's still standing, because what he endured took courage and strength that I don't know that I have.
author: Don Lemon

quote: You know, oil prices from 2007, on the strength of a very robust global economy and a very robust emerging China, many of you will recall, ramped up to near $150 a barrel. Then we had the financial - U.S. financial collapse. Oil prices collapsed all the way down to $40 a barrel.
author: Rex Tillerson

quote: If you are playing on a turning wicket, toss plays an important role. The team that wins the toss gets an opportunity to play on the fresh wicket. You should always prepare the wicket as per team's strength. But a rank turner might backfire.
author: Kapil Dev

quote: I have both English bulldog determination and Bengal tiger strength.
author: Bikram Choudhury

quote: When liberals finally grasped the strength of popular feeling about the family, they cried to appropriate the rhetoric and symbolism of family values for their own purposes.
author: Christopher Lasch

quote: The breaking wave and the muscle as it contracts obey the same law. Delicate line gathers the body's total strength in a bold balance. Shall my soul meet so severe a curve, journeying on its way to form?
author: Dag Hammarskjold

quote: Libraries are reservoirs of strength, grace and wit, reminders of order, calm and continuity, lakes of mental energy, neither warm nor cold, light nor dark.
author: Germaine Greer

quote: Our passion is our strength.
author: Billie Joe Armstrong

quote: I've felt real pain, and sometimes I channel the exhale coming out of that to write, and those are the songs that give me the most power and the most strength.
author: Jillian Rose Banks

quote: I realized that, while I would never be my mother nor have her life, the lesson she had left me was that it was possible to love and care for a man and still have at your core a strength so great that you never even needed to put it on display.
author: Anna Quindlen

quote: Even as we enumerate their shortcomings, the rigor of raising children ourselves makes clear to us our mothers' incredible strength. We fear both. If they are not strong, who will protect us? If they are not imperfect, how can we equal them?
author: Anna Quindlen

quote: Superstars come and go. I want to make sure I am always a producer's actor. I may be refused to be called a great actor but I have never troubled any of my producers in my life. Honesty always catches the camera, and that is what my strength is.
author: Akshay Kumar

quote: I also wanted to express the strength of cinema to hide reality, while being entertaining. Cinema can fill in the empty spaces of your life and your loneliness.
author: Pedro Almodovar

quote: If the label presents them with a contract that the band don't want to sign, all the label has to do is wait. There are a hundred other bands willing to sign the exact same contract, so the label is in a position of strength.
author: Steve Albini

quote: We all need Europe, not just those of us in Europe. And we Germans need Europe more than the others. Germany is the country with the longest border, the most neighbours, and is, by population and economic strength, the number one in Europe.
author: Helmut Kohl

quote: I am not yet born O fill me with strength against those who would freeze my humanity.
author: Louis MacNeice

quote: From the gut comes the strut, and where hunger reigns, strength abstains.
author: Francois Rabelais

quote: Just like you need to strengthen your core physically with exercise, you also need to strength your core spiritually.
author: Anne Graham Lotz

quote: I am always interested in that relationship between outer reality and inner desire, and I think it is important to pay attention to the inner voice because it is the only way to discover your mission in life and the only way to develop the strength to break with whatever familial or cultural norms are preventing you from fulfilling your destiny.
author: Laura Esquivel

quote: I'd try to channel my nervous energy in a positive way into strength and endurance. It didn't always work.
author: Kristi Yamaguchi

quote: Exercising and eating properly will build your physical and mental strength to endure the stressful situation.
author: David H. Murdock

quote: It might be asked, 'How much time shall I allow myself for rest?' The answer is that no rule of universal application can be given, as all persons do not require the same measure of sleep, and also the same persons, at different times, according to the strength or weakness of their body, may require more or less.
author: George Muller

quote: Man has not really vanquished Shamanism and its spooks till he possesses the strength to lay aside not only the belief in ghosts or in spirits, but also the belief in the spirit.
author: Max Stirner

quote: I think there's a great strength in having the courage and also having the support to do what you want to do when you're an artist in any way, shape or form.
author: Dave Gahan

quote: There is strength in numbers, but organizing those numbers is one of the great challenges.
author: John C. Mather

quote: Only out of great vulnerability do you discover what strength you have. Having a daughter who I love with all my being has helped me mine the source of that strength to previously unknown depths.
author: Emilia Fox

quote: One cannot weep for the entire world, it is beyond human strength. One must choose.
author: Jean Anouilh

quote: You won't find a CEO who doesn't talk about a 'powerful culture' as a source of competitive advantage. At the same time, you'd be hard-pressed to find a CEO who has much of a clue about the strength of that culture.
author: Marcus Buckingham

quote: The Hulk was a unique character because of his strength and power. He doesn't have a costume like Spiderman or like Superman - The Hulk is more visual. His passion and his strength, that is what separates him from anything else.
author: Lou Ferrigno

quote: God is not accustomed to refusing a good gift to those who ask for one. Since he is good, and especially to those who are faithful to him, let us hold fast to him with all our soul, our heart, our strength, and so enjoy his light and see his glory and possess the grace of supernatural joy.
author: Saint Ambrose

quote: Wisdom is always an overmatch for strength.
author: Phil Jackson

quote: African women in general need to know that it's OK for them to be the way they are - to see the way they are as a strength, and to be liberated from fear and from silence.
author: Wangari Maathai

quote: I have the strength to endure it all.
author: Moshe Dayan

quote: That strange feeling we had in the war. Have you found anything in your lives since to equal it in strength? A sort of splendid carelessness it was, holding us together.
author: Noel Coward

quote: I never won anything by myself. I was always strong because of help that gave me extra strength to win.
author: Dan Gable

quote: Men are beginning to realize that they are not individuals but persons in society, that man alone is weak and adrift, that he must seek strength in common action.
author: Dorothy Day

quote: Without strength and courage it's really hard to perform at the highest levels of international figure skating, because you're alone on the ice and you only have seven minutes over two nights to prove yourself.
author: Scott Hamilton

quote: Truly, love is delightful and pleasant food, supplying, as it does, rest to the weary, strength to the weak, and joy to the sorrowful. It in fact renders the yoke of truth easy and its burden light.
author: Saint Bernard

quote: The serenity prayer, 'God grant me the strength to accept...' That's a prayer that's actually in my car. I say it every day.
author: Lauren London

quote: I gain strength from postive thought and from the daily conversation with God.
author: Ottmar Hitzfeld

quote: When spirituality is the basis of your life, it gives you the strength, wisdom and courage to surmount the many storms of life that could destroy a weaker person who doesn't have this foundation.
author: Radhanath Swami

quote: I can't distract myself enough here, for sketches to a new opera are constantly buzzing around in my head, to the extent that I need all my strength to wrest myself from them.
author: Richard Wagner

quote: We set ourselves limits, but we are all strong enough to aim higher, to achieve our goals. All we have to do is find such strength within ourselves. Know how to develop it.
author: Alain Robert

quote: I always try to see the good in everything, and that gives me strength. Even when I lost in the London Olympics quarterfinals, I said to myself, 'Don't lose heart, God has his own plans.' Actually, life just goes on; you have to accept whatever challenge you face and become stronger.
author: Vijender Singh

quote: America is moving forward and gaining strength. We have been tested, and we have proven ourselves to be a tough, resilient and resourceful nation.
author: Bill Frist

quote: We should believe in the strength and vitality of the values which constitute the E.U. and which neighbouring states can believe in and aspire to join.
author: Donald Tusk

quote: My dad's a bodybuilder. My whole life I've been taught to train the hard way. I believe in earning strength, not buying it. My grandfather raised me old school: In baseball, you work for whatever you get.
author: Gary Sheffield

quote: Strengthen me by sympathizing with my strength, not my weakness.
author: Amos Bronson Alcott

quote: I think my versatility is a big strength. I don't think anybody can guard me, just because I'm 6'10 and can dribble and play point. If I have a little guy on me, I take him to the post. For me to be able to then pass the ball, it helps me a lot.
author: Ben Simmons

quote: We are a long time in learning that all our strength and salvation is in God.
author: David Brainerd

quote: Once more, Never think that you can live to God by your own power or strength; but always look to and rely on him for assistance, yea, for all strength and grace.
author: David Brainerd

quote: It is very important to me to maintain a consistent workout regimen during the season. The Bulls staff does a great job with providing me with a weekly workout, and these kept me energized throughout my rookie season. In the off season, I try to increase my strength and add new dimensions to my game.
author: Derrick Rose

quote: A coach once told me there are four factors that determine a players' performance: his tactical awareness, his physical condition, his technical ability and his mental strength.
author: Gary Neville

quote: It's great to have an honest course where you can use your strength. I swim 10 hours a week, I bike 20 hours a week, and I want to be able to show that.
author: Jonathan Brownlee

quote: Superior strength is found in the long run to lie with those who had right on their side.
author: James Anthony Froude

quote: Faith is the most important thing in the world to me. It's the greatest strength I've had. It's helped me get through the hard times. You're not going to win every one of your football games. I've always said I'm not going to make football my god. A lot of coaches put so much into coaching football games that they have nothing left.
author: Bobby Bowden

quote: Some in my party threaten to send a message that they don't know a just war when they see it, and more broadly that they're not prepared to use our military strength to protect our security and the cause of freedom.
author: Joe Lieberman

quote: The strength in our third-quarter financial results is cause for excitement. I'm particularly pleased that we continue to demonstrate impressive growth at the same time we are engaged in important merger discussions.
author: Bernard Ebbers

quote: I will continue to push for doubling the strength of the U.S. Border Patrol, and to make sure that every cargo container that enters this nation is screened for radiation and potential weapons of mass destruction.
author: Nick Lampson

quote: We all have those things that even in the midst of stress and disarray, they energize us and give us renewed strength and purpose. These are our passions.
author: Adam Braun

quote: I'm very lucky that people are able to say, 'Oh, that's that Moody Blues guy!' I'm very fortunate with that. That's all. Without the songs, I think, I'd just be a pretty average karaoke singer. In the end, it comes down to the songs: the strength of the songs.
author: Justin Hayward

quote: Whatever I lack in size and strength and speed, I kind of make up for in being grittier. When it comes to something like basketball I'm definitely not the best guy on the court, but I love elbowing and pushing people out or boxing them out.
author: Steven Yeun

quote: In some ways, I feel like the strength of animation is in its simplicity and caricature, and in reduction. It's like an Al Hirschfeld caricature, where he'll use, like, three lines, and he'll capture the likeness of someone so strongly that it looks more like them than a photograph. I think animation has that same power of reduction.
author: Pete Docter

quote: At some point, I fell in love. Shortly thereafter, I got my heart broken. Sniff, sniff. And I realized at a young age - no matter what any adult literary critic would have us believe about female strength and autonomy - there is no test to strength of character like love.
author: Lauren Kate

quote: When I was first introduced to CrossFit, I found it to be the hardest workout that I'd ever done. It wiped the floor with me, and I fell in love with it immediately. The results that I have seen in my strength and physicality have been unparalleled to any other things I have ever done in my more than 20 years in the fitness business.
author: Bob Harper

quote: My mother was the dearest, sweetest angel. She didn't talk; she sang. She was a tower of strength.
author: Jayne Meadows

quote: Augustine says that you don't understand a nation by the throw weight of its military or the strength of its research universities or the size of its population, but by looking at what it loves in common. To assess a nation, you look at the health and strength of its ideals. And there's no question that the common love in America is freedom.
author: Os Guinness

quote: Our strength in finance has led us to set up an international financial centre with medium and long-term objectives, especially to develop Islamic financial and insurance services.
author: Hassanal Bolkiah

quote: As far as the U.S. economy is concerned, I always believe that the U.S. economy is solidly based, not only in a material sense, but more importantly, the United States has the strength of scientific and technological talent, and managerial expertise.
author: Wen Jiabao

quote: Apart from boosting our long-term economic strength like other Asian economic powers, Philippine companies expanding overseas and going beyond our comfort zones, or going to some uncharted territories, will help sharpen our management skills.
author: Andrew Tan

quote: Lincoln's stature and strength, his intelligence and ambition - in short, all the elements which gave him popularity among men in New Salem, rendered him equally attractive to the fair sex of that village.
author: John George Nicolay

quote: Each is under the most sacred obligation not to squander the material committed to him, not to sap his strength in folly and vice, and to see at the least that he delivers a product worthy the labor and cost which have been expended on him.
author: Anna Julia Cooper

quote: Sometimes your disappointments make you a stronger person for the future.
author: Blanka Vlasic

quote: It requires more strength to be gentle, so it's the everyday encounters of life that I think we've prepared children for and prepared them to be good to other people and to consider other people.
author: Bob Keeshan

quote: Better than the strength of men and horses is our wisdom.
author: Xenophanes

quote: Before I became a fighter pilot, everyone said that women didn't have the physical strength. Well, I had just completed the Hawaii Ironman Triathlon.
author: Martha McSally

quote: First I shall name the eagle, of which there are three species: the great grey eagle is the largest, of great strength and high flight; he chiefly preys on fawns and other young quadrupeds.
author: William Bartram

quote: Some spider silks are really strong, but not all of them are. The ones that are really strong can actually rival steel and approach the tensile strength of Kevlar. Thus far, the dragline silk seems to be the strongest.
author: Cheryl Hayashi

quote: 'One Yellow Daffodil' is both a look to the past and to the future and expresses my belief in the great spirit and strength of our children.
author: David A. Adler

quote: I've never been one to be too careful with my diet. If I really start watching what I eat, I'm already a thin guy - I just won't have any physical strength. I think I'll disappear if I don't eat what I need to eat or what I like to eat.
author: Daniel Nestor

quote: The swimmer adrift on the open seas measures his strength, and strives with all his muscles to keep himself afloat. But what is he to do when there is no land on the horizon, and none beyond it?
author: Georges Duhamel

quote: When I go to the gym, stretching is very important. For polo, you don't need too much strength so you don't want to build yourself up too much. It's all about flexibility.
author: Nacho Figueras

quote: But after this natural burst of indignation, no man of sense, courage, or prudence will waste his time or his strength in retrospective reproaches or repinings.
author: Robert Peel

quote: Part of my strength as an actor comes from what I've learned all these years: when you play a villain, you try to get the light touches; when you play a hero, you try to get in some of the warts.
author: John Forsythe

quote: I am proud to represent people who care so deeply about their communities. Their perseverance and strength only motivates me more as their representative in Congress.
author: Martha Roby

quote: I grew up in a strong faith-based family. I think I have selected to return to those roots for strength, for my family, for myself and to protect our children and to forgive others and move on and face forward.
author: Paula Broadwell

quote: My practicality consists in this, in the knowledge that if you beat your head against the wall it is your head which breaks and not the wall - that is my strength, my only strength.
author: Antonio Gramsci

quote: Every burden is a blessing.
author: Walt Kelly

quote: It is no use painting the foot of the tree white, the strength of the bark cries out from beneath the paint.
author: Aime Cesaire

quote: Knowledge is not a passion from without the mind, but an active exertion of the inward strength, vigor and power of the mind, displaying itself from within.
author: Ralph Cudworth

quote: Tonight I should like to thank all those who have shared my work and to acknowledge the debt that I owe to my wife whose encouragement to put research before all other things has been a great strength to me.
author: George Porter

quote: I have a concept of Naples that is not so much of a city, per se, but rather an ingredient of the human spirit that I detect in everyone, Neapolitan or not. The idea that 'Neapolitanism' and mass ignorance are somehow indissolubly linked is one that I am prepared to fight with all the strength I have.
author: Luciano De Crescenzo

quote: God is waiting eagerly to respond with new strength to each little act of self-control, small disciplines of prayer, feeble searching after him. And his children shall be filled if they will only hunger and thirst after what he offers.
author: Richard Holloway

quote: Patience is not simply the ability to wait - it's how we behave while we're waiting.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: Never cut a tree down in the wintertime. Never make a negative decision in the low time. Never make your most important decisions when you are in your worst moods. Wait. Be patient. The storm will pass. The spring will come.
author: Robert H. Schuller

quote: Patience and perseverance have a magical effect before which difficulties disappear and obstacles vanish.
author: John Quincy Adams

quote: We could never learn to be brave and patient, if there were only joy in the world.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Each life is made up of mistakes and learning, waiting and growing, practicing patience and being persistent.
author: Billy Graham

quote: Patience is a virtue, and I'm learning patience. It's a tough lesson.
author: Elon Musk

quote: The test of good manners is to be patient with the bad ones.
author: Solomon Ibn Gabirol

quote: Be patient and understanding. Life is too short to be vengeful or malicious.
author: Phillips Brooks

quote: Patience is the companion of wisdom.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: I have embraced crying mothers who have lost their children because our politicians put their personal agendas before the national good. I have no patience for injustice, no tolerance for government incompetence, no sympathy for leaders who fail their citizens.
author: Donald Trump

quote: Indeed, this life is a test. It is a test of many things - of our convictions and priorities, our faith and our faithfulness, our patience and our resilience, and in the end, our ultimate desires.
author: Sheri L. Dew

quote: I have just three things to teach: simplicity, patience, compassion. These three are your greatest treasures.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Qualities you need to get through medical school and residency: Discipline. Patience. Perseverance. A willingness to forgo sleep. A penchant for sadomasochism. Ability to weather crises of faith and self-confidence. Accept exhaustion as fact of life. Addiction to caffeine a definite plus. Unfailing optimism that the end is in sight.
author: Khaled Hosseini

quote: I am patient with stupidity but not with those who are proud of it.
author: Edith Sitwell

quote: Sometimes we may ask God for success, and He gives us physical and mental stamina. We might plead for prosperity, and we receive enlarged perspective and increased patience, or we petition for growth and are blessed with the gift of grace. He may bestow upon us conviction and confidence as we strive to achieve worthy goals.
author: David A. Bednar

quote: Genius is patience.
author: Isaac Newton

quote: I learned patience, perseverance, and dedication. Now I really know myself, and I know my voice. It's a voice of pain and victory.
author: Anthony Hamilton

quote: Sometimes things aren't clear right away. That's where you need to be patient and persevere and see where things lead.
author: Mary Pierce

quote: The more you know yourself, the more patience you have for what you see in others.
author: Erik Erikson

quote: The keys to patience are acceptance and faith. Accept things as they are, and look realistically at the world around you. Have faith in yourself and in the direction you have chosen.
author: Ralph Marston

quote: The very important thing you should have is patience.
author: Jack Ma

quote: If patience is worth anything, it must endure to the end of time. And a living faith will last in the midst of the blackest storm.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: I simply do not think that yelling, swearing, threatening or belittling will get you to the place you want to be faster than kindness, understanding, patience and a little willingness to compromise.
author: Rachel Nichols

quote: Obstacles, of course, are developmentally necessary: they teach kids strategy, patience, critical thinking, resilience and resourcefulness.
author: Naomi Wolf

quote: Patience is the secret to good food.
author: Gail Simmons

quote: It is easier to find men who will volunteer to die, than to find those who are willing to endure pain with patience.
author: Julius Caesar

quote: Above all, remember that God looks for solid virtues in us, such as patience, humility, obedience, abnegation of your own will - that is, the good will to serve Him and our neighbor in Him. His providence allows us other devotions only insofar as He sees that they are useful to us.
author: Saint Ignatius

quote: Amongst the qualities a hero should have, I would include determination, loyalty, courage, perseverance, patience, focus, intrepidity and selflessness.
author: Ricky Martin

quote: Have patience with all things, But, first of all with yourself.
author: Saint Francis de Sales

quote: Come what may, all bad fortune is to be conquered by endurance.
author: Virgil

quote: You can't jump from little things to big things. It just takes time and patience.
author: Nadia Comaneci

quote: With care and patience, people may accomplish things which, to an indolent person, would appear impossible.
author: Dorothea Dix

quote: To learn patience is not to rebel against every hardship.
author: Henri Nouwen

quote: There is no road too long to the man who advances deliberately and without undue haste there are no honors too distant to the man who prepares himself for them with patience.
author: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: Endurance is patience concentrated.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: Allah is with people who show patience. If you are down in the dumps, Allah will help you if you have belief. But this is a personal thing between you and him. You can't fool Allah.
author: Mohammad Azharuddin

quote: Patience is necessary, and one cannot reap immediately where one has sown.
author: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: Patience has its limits. Take it too far, and it's cowardice.
author: George Jackson

quote: If I have done the public any service, it is due to my patient thought.
author: Isaac Newton

quote: The Scriptures contain many stories of people who waited years or even decades before the Lord's promises came to pass. What modern believers can learn from the patience of biblical saints like Abraham, Joseph, David, and Paul is that waiting upon the Lord has eternal rewards.
author: Charles Stanley

quote: And I love that even in the toughest moments, when we're all sweating it - when we're worried that the bill won't pass, and it seems like all is lost - Barack never lets himself get distracted by the chatter and the noise. Just like his grandmother, he just keeps getting up and moving forward... with patience and wisdom, and courage and grace.
author: Michelle Obama

quote: Wise to resolve, and patient to perform.
author: Homer

quote: Having patience is one of the hardest things about being human. We want to do it now, and we don't want to wait. Sometimes we miss out on our blessing when we rush things and do it on our own time.
author: Deontay Wilder

quote: Patience and Diligence, like faith, remove mountains.
author: William Penn

quote: No, I will be the pattern of all patience; I will say nothing.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Patience is the art of concealing your impatience.
author: Guy Kawasaki

quote: It is strange that the years teach us patience; that the shorter our time, the greater our capacity for waiting.
author: Elizabeth Taylor

quote: The strong manly ones in life are those who understand the meaning of the word patience.
author: Tokugawa Ieyasu

quote: The overwhelming message of the Atonement is the perfect love the Savior has for each and all of us. It is a love which is full of mercy, patience, grace, equity, long-suffering, and, above all, forgiving.
author: James E. Faust

quote: A man who is a master of patience is master of everything else.
author: George Savile

quote: Genius is eternal patience.
author: Michelangelo

quote: Patience doesn't mean making a pact with the devil of denial, ignoring our emotions and aspirations. It means being wholeheartedly engaged in the process that's unfolding, rather than ripping open a budding flower or demanding a caterpillar hurry up and get that chrysalis stage over with.
author: Sharon Salzberg

quote: Have courage for the great sorrows of life and patience for the small ones; and when you have laboriously accomplished your daily task, go to sleep in peace.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: To bear with patience wrongs done to oneself is a mark of perfection, but to bear with patience wrongs done to someone else is a mark of imperfection and even of actual sin.
author: Thomas Aquinas

quote: Only those who have patience to do simple things perfectly ever acquire the skill to do difficult things easily.
author: James J. Corbett

quote: As anyone who has ever been around a cat for any length of time well knows, cats have enormous patience with the limitations of the human kind.
author: Cleveland Amory

quote: Raising children uses every bit of your being - your heart, your time, your patience, your foresight, your intuition to protect them, and you have to use all of this while trying to figure out how to discipline them.
author: Nicole Ari Parker

quote: The great saints were always great innovators... They had to be very strong people... principled people. And, apart from their principles, with great tenacity they had to have great reserves of patience.
author: Colm Wilkinson

quote: He who rides the sea of the Nile must have sails woven of patience.
author: William Golding

quote: How can a society that exists on instant mashed potatoes, packaged cake mixes, frozen dinners, and instant cameras teach patience to its young?
author: Paul Sweeney

quote: I have learned that I really do have discipline, self-control, and patience. But they were given to me as a seed, and it's up to me to choose to develop them.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: There are three secrets to managing. The first secret is have patience. The second is be patient. And the third most important secret is patience.
author: Chuck Tanner

quote: God always has patience.
author: Pope Francis

quote: In a world where people are hungry for quick fixes and sound bites, for instant gratification, there's no patience for the long, slow rebuilding process: implementing after-school programs, hiring more community workers to act as mentors, adding more job training programs in marginalized areas.
author: Dan Hill

quote: We have no patience with other people's vanity because it is offensive to our own.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: For anything worth having one must pay the price; and the price is always work, patience, love, self-sacrifice - no paper currency, no promises to pay, but the gold of real service.
author: John Burroughs

quote: Tolerance, compromise, understanding, acceptance, patience - I want those all to be very sharp tools in my shed.
author: CeeLo Green

quote: The greatest power is often simple patience.
author: E. Joseph Cossman

quote: Beware of him that is slow to anger; for when it is long coming, it is the stronger when it comes, and the longer kept. Abused patience turns to fury.
author: Francis Quarles

quote: Meekness: Uncommon patience in planning a revenge that is worth while.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: My three Ps: passion, patience, perseverance. You have to do this if you've got to be a filmmaker.
author: Robert Wise

quote: Gardeners are good at nurturing, and they have a great quality of patience, they're tender. They have to be persistent.
author: Ralph Fiennes

quote: There is no substitute for hard work, 23 or 24 hours a day. And there is no substitute for patience and acceptance.
author: Cesar Chavez

quote: Writing is good, thinking is better. Cleverness is good, patience is better.
author: Herman Hesse

quote: A man with a silver spoon may get his share of supporters, but he can never be an inspiration for somebody! Patience and hard work are the key to every man's success.
author: Kailash Kher

quote: I have no patience for wasting time.
author: William Clay Ford, Jr.

quote: America is a great country. It has a lot of work to do. The bottom line is it's easy to talk; it's easy to have the media pick up on something, and it's hard to have the patience to put something in place you can build on that will make sure each citizen has their equal rights.
author: Jim Brown

quote: Patience with family members and others who are close to us is vital for us to have happy homes.
author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quote: The two biggest things that translate from the pitching mound to hunting and fishing are patience and perseverance. When you're on the mound, you have to take the game one pitch at a time, regardless of the score, and that approach helps when I'm in the woods or on the water as well.
author: Jon Lester

quote: The loving parts of your personality have no trouble loving. That is all they do. You experience the loving parts of as gratitude, appreciation, caring, patience, contentment and awe of life.
author: Gary Zukav

quote: How many a man has thrown up his hands at a time when a little more effort, a little more patience would have achieved success.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: I am not a perfect servant. I am a public servant doing my best against the odds. As I develop and serve, be patient. God is not finished with me yet.
author: Jesse Jackson

quote: Teach us, O Lord, the disciplines of patience, for to wait is often harder than to work.
author: Peter Marshall

quote: Patience is the best remedy for every trouble.
author: Plautus

quote: Humility is attentive patience.
author: Simone Weil

quote: All commend patience, but none can endure to suffer.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: Patience, that blending of moral courage with physical timidity.
author: Thomas Hardy

quote: If you believe indeed in the Lord Jesus for the salvation of your soul, if you walk uprightly and do not regard iniquity in your heart, if you continue to wait patiently, and believingly upon God; then answers will surely be given to your prayers.
author: George Muller

quote: All men commend patience, although few are willing to practice it.
author: Thomas a Kempis

quote: No one can occupy your generosity except you. Who can occupy your patience when impatience roars through you? Who except you can choose not to act with judgment when all of your thoughts are judgmental? Your life is yours to live, no matter how you choose to live it. When you do not think about how you intend to live it, it lives you.
author: Gary Zukav

quote: Clearly older women and especially older women who have led an active life or elder women who successfully maneuver through their own family life have so much to teach us about sharing, patience, and wisdom.
author: Alice Walker

quote: Patience means restraining one's inclinations.
author: Tokugawa Ieyasu

quote: With patience and persistence, even the smallest act of discipleship or the tiniest ember of belief can become a blazing bonfire of a consecrated life. In fact, that's how most bonfires begin - as a simple spark.
author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quote: Find patience in the breath of life.
author: Ryunosuke Satoro

quote: You have to find the peace and patience within yourself to be a model and an example to others and not judge.
author: Judith Light

quote: Deliberately seek opportunities for kindness, sympathy, and patience.
author: Evelyn Underhill

quote: Patience is the best medicine.
author: John Florio

quote: There's not a lot of room anymore for what I call 'made-up' drama. The drama comes from real places now - marriage takes work and focus, the kid stuff takes patience and commitment. And if you don't grow as people and as a couple, within all of that, then you've got some real drama.
author: Jeremy Sisto

quote: This is me, a sinner on whom the Lord has turned his gaze. And this is what I said when they asked me if I would accept my election as pontiff. I am a sinner, but I trust in the infinite mercy and patience of our Lord Jesus Christ, and I accept in a spirit of penance.
author: Pope Francis

quote: With marriage and fatherhood, I've finally found two fixed points in my life. They've taught me patience. They've also taught me that I don't need to feel guilty about being happy. My emotional seasons are less extreme.
author: Pete Wentz

quote: People make mistakes all the time. We learn and grow. If there's patience and love, and you care for people, you can work them through it, and they can find their greatest heights.
author: Pete Carroll

quote: Learning patience was not an easy lesson.
author: Michael Douglas

quote: The writer's secret is not inspiration - for it is never clear where it comes from - it is his stubbornness, his patience.
author: Orhan Pamuk

quote: It is one thing to train officers on fighting crime. It is a whole other thing to train them to build friendships and relationships, which are integral to fighting crime. This takes time, effort, and patience on the part of police officers.
author: Rahm Emanuel

quote: Who shall resist Anti-Christ when he comes if we show such patience towards the vices and crimes of his precursors? By such leniency, we encourage kings to become tyrants and tempt them to withdraw every privilege and all jurisdiction from the Churches.
author: Thomas Becket

quote: I have no patience with dinosaurs.
author: Adam West

quote: Soon I knew the craft of experimental physics was beyond me - it was the sublime quality of patience - patience in accumulating data, patience with recalcitrant equipment - which I sadly lacked.
author: Abdus Salam

quote: I'm very caring with animals. I think patience is a big deal, because animals are always jumping around. I love to take care of people, so I think I'd be a good vet. I always wanted to be a vet when I was little.
author: Jennifer Love Hewitt

quote: The moment a large investor doesn't believe a government will pay back its debt when it says it will, a crisis of confidence could develop. Investors have scant patience for the years of good governance - politically fraught fiscal restructuring, austerity and debt rescheduling - it takes to defuse a sovereign-debt crisis.
author: Andrew Ross Sorkin

quote: The Lord, Jesus Christ, is our perfect example of patience.
author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quote: It takes patience to appreciate domestic bliss volatile spirits prefer unhappiness.
author: George Santayana

quote: Ultimately, knowing God and reading the Word, it helps with patience with people, understanding, empathy and sympathy that they might not have that I have. If God gave it to me, why not exercise it?
author: Trai Byers

quote: A statesman wants courage and a statesman wants vision; but believe me, after six months' experience, he wants first, second, third and all the time - patience.
author: Stanley Baldwin

quote: Sometimes they are a matter of luck; the photographer could not expect or hope for them. Sometimes they are a matter of patience, waiting for an effect to be repeated that he has seen and lost or for one that he anticipates.
author: Bill Brandt

quote: Patience, n. A minor form of dispair, disguised as a virtue.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: I'm not really easy to live with! There needs to be unlimited patience and unconditional love. Men I've known before loved my independent spirit and were proud of my success, to the point that they'd become jealous of the time I devote to my career.
author: Milla Jovovich

quote: Affliction is the wholesome soil of virtue, where patience, honor, sweet humility, and calm fortitude, take root and strongly flourish.
author: David Mallet

quote: I do not believe that sheer suffering teaches. If suffering alone taught, all the world would be wise, since everyone suffers. To suffering must be added mourning, understanding, patience, love, openness and the willingness to remain vulnerable.
author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quote: After the match-fixing allegations, the one thing I had was patience. It took a lot of time for the courts to come to a verdict regarding the case. Sometimes, there were adjournments, but during that time, I had patience. We fought very hard, and finally justice prevailed, and we got the right verdict.
author: Mohammad Azharuddin

quote: The biggest advice I can give loved ones who are supporting someone navigating a newly diagnosed mental illness is patience, patience, and patience.
author: Madchen Amick

quote: Everyone is bound to bear patiently the results of his own example.
author: Phaedrus

quote: I pack a toothbrush, toothpaste, and deodorant. That's it. I don't have the time or patience for anything else. I'm a natural kind of guy. I don't style my hair - never learned how.
author: Paul Walker

quote: Fortune knocks but once, but misfortune has much more patience.
author: Laurence J. Peter

quote: I try not to set myself up as different or as a celebrity or special. I have a husband that can get on my nerves. I have kids that test my patience. I've got a cat I can't keep off the sofa. It's real. On a bad day, I'm reading 'Acts of Faith.'
author: Iyanla Vanzant

quote: I don't have much patience for people who are self-conscious about the act of eating, and it irritates me when someone denies themselves the pleasure of a bloody hunk of steak or a pungent French cheese because of some outdated nonsense about what's appropriate or attractive.
author: Anthony Bourdain

quote: Patience has its limits, take it too far and it's cowardice.
author: Holbrook Jackson

quote: I have no regrets about not having children. I still wait for the pang of guilt, but I have none. I tune into the television show 'Nanny 911' occasionally which reminds me how much patience and love it take to be a good parent.
author: Amanda Donohoe

quote: I know one of the reasons God gave me kids was to test my patience.
author: Faith Hill

quote: One of the things I've been taught by Native American elders is the importance of patience, of waiting to do things when the time is right.
author: Joseph Bruchac

quote: As a result of the strategic patience policy, we now have North Korea testing four times an atomic weapon; they've violated numerous United Nations sanctions, U.S. sanctions by launching ballistic missile tests.
author: Cory Gardner

quote: How poor are they that have not patience! What wound did ever heal but by degrees?
author: William Shakespeare

quote: I think you can judge from somebody's actions a kind of a stability and sense of purpose perhaps created by strong religious roots. I mean, there's a certain patience, a certain discipline, I think, that religion helps you achieve.
author: George W. Bush

quote: I've learned that anything in life worth having comes from patience and hard work.
author: Greg Behrendt

quote: I'm a peace-maker, I can fit into a lot of situations. I'm pretty easygoing. I have a lot of patience.
author: Jennifer Garner

quote: I think we can all use a little more patience. I get a little impatient sometimes and I wish I didn't. I really need to be more patient.
author: Ryan Reynolds

quote: The only thing of weight that can be said against modern honor is that it is directly opposite to religion. The one bids you bear injuries with patience, the other tells you if you don't resent them, you are not fit to live.
author: Bernard de Mandeville

quote: You must first have a lot of patience to learn to have patience.
author: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec

quote: It is impossible to practice parliamentary politics without having patience, decency, politeness and courtesy.
author: Khaleda Zia

quote: Never a tear bedims the eye that time and patience will not dry.
author: Bret Harte

quote: Our real blessings often appear to us in the shape of pains, losses and disappointments; but let us have patience and we soon shall see them in their proper figures.
author: Joseph Addison

quote: Lack of pep is often mistaken for patience.
author: Kin Hubbard

quote: I'm patient.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: Heaven grant us patience with a man in love.
author: Rudyard Kipling

quote: Abused patience turns to fury.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: Patience, the beggar's virtue, shall find no harbor here.
author: Philip Massinger

quote: God gives me the children's ministry heart and patience. This is what He wants. It's awesome. I don't know where He's gonna take it - but God is building this thing.
author: Willie Aames

quote: I haven't been given many things, but I've been given ample, limitless patience.
author: Lincoln Diaz-Balart

quote: Patience can't be acquired overnight. It is just like building up a muscle. Every day you need to work on it.
author: Eknath Easwaran

quote: Hopelessness has surprised me with patience.
author: Margaret J. Wheatley

quote: We had great faith that with patience, understanding, and education, that my family and I could be helpful in changing their minds and attitudes around.
author: Ryan White

quote: Reading a novel in which all characters illustrate patience, hard work, chastity, and delayed gratification could be a pretty dull experience.
author: Thomas Perry

quote: The patience of the American public with dilatory diplomatic delays will be very limited.
author: Tom Lantos

quote: In movies, there are some things the French do that Americans are increasingly incapable of doing. One is honoring the complexities of youth. It's a quiet, difficult undertaking, requiring subtlety in a filmmaker and perception and patience from us.
author: Wesley Morris

quote: To understand a difficult topic like Iraq takes patience and care. Unfortunately, you rarely hear a patient, careful or thoughtful discussion of intelligence these days.
author: George Tenet

quote: I'd like to be more patient! I just want everything now. I've tried to meditate, but it's really hard for me to stay still. I'd like to try to force myself to do it, because everybody says how wonderful meditation is for you, but I can't shut my mind up. So patience and learning is the key.
author: Ellen DeGeneres

quote: The term 'alpha female' originated in my field of animal behavior, but has acquired new meaning. It refers to women who are in charge, for example, by flirting and dating on their own terms. It is also used maliciously for a loud-mouthed, controlling woman who has no patience with deviating opinions.
author: Frans de Waal

quote: A monk's extraordinary patience can be a hindrance to desperate decision-making.
author: Harsha Bhogle

quote: When I worked with wildlife a lot in the Eighties and Nineties, I learnt the meaning of patience. And when I worked with trees, I learned the meaning of humility.
author: James Balog

quote: As wonderful as they were, my parents didn't teach me anything about self-discipline, concentration, patience, or focus. If I hadn't had a family myself, I probably never would've done anything. Marriage taught me responsibility.
author: Dick Van Dyke

quote: Becoming a father increases your capacity for love and your level of patience. It opens up another door in a person - a door which you may not even have known was there. That's what I feel with my son. There's suddenly another level of love that expands. My son is my greatest joy, out of everything in my life.
author: Kyle MacLachlan

quote: Information is not knowledge, and knowledge is not wisdom. Reading - even browsing - an old book can yield sustenance denied by a database search. Patience is a virtue, gluttony a sin.
author: James Gleick

quote: There are three lessons in philanthropy - one, involve the family, especially the spouse. She can be a remarkable driver of your initiative. Two, you need to build an institution, and you need to scale it up. Choose a leader for philanthropy whom you trust. Three, philanthropy needs patience, tenacity and time.
author: Azim Premji

quote: For correct writing, the cultivation of patience and mental accuracy is essential. Throughout the young author's period of apprenticeship, he must keep reliable dictionaries and textbooks at his elbow; eschewing as far as possible that hasty extemporaneous manner of writing which is the privilege of more advanced students.
author: H. P. Lovecraft

quote: Storytelling is about patience, about making sense of the moments of pathos and beauty that you find, and about carrying these moments back into your own life.
author: Michael Paterniti

quote: The biggest thing I possess is infinite patience. Once you are patient, things fall in place.
author: Mohammad Azharuddin

quote: You have to be very strong and headstrong to make your place. You have to know how to say no. Patience is very important.
author: Yami Gautam

quote: To the fans, thank you for your patience and concern. They've been on point with my career, especially after my injuries.
author: Rey Mysterio

quote: Luck is a component that a lot of people in the arts sometimes fail to recognise: that you can have talent, perseverance, patience, but without luck you will not have a successful career.
author: Bryan Cranston

quote: When things begin accelerating wildly out of control, sometimes patience is the only answer. Press pause.
author: Douglas Rushkoff

quote: I don't think patience is something that any of us grow up with in a large dose. It's a world of instant gratification.
author: Tim Cope

quote: No one thought the Mayweather-Pacquiao fight would happen, but I had patience.
author: Floyd Mayweather, Jr.

quote: The one thing about the business of entertainment is that you have to learn patience.
author: Kevin Hart

quote: I was a big Guns N' Roses fan when I was seven. My friend who lived across the street had long dark curly hair and I had long blonde hair, so I'd dress up as Axl and she'd be Slash, and we'd rock out in front of the mirror singing 'Patience.'
author: Kirsten Dunst

quote: I've learned the importance of loving what you do. I have also learned more patience due to the nature of the music business.
author: Randy Travis

quote: It seems likely that many of the young who don't wait for others to call them artists, but simply announce that they are, don't have the patience to make art.
author: Pauline Kael

quote: I think my best teacher and my best study was theater in general. It taught me a lot of patience and a lot of hard work, and I think that theater teaches you that you've got to know your stuff because you only get one chance.
author: Chelsea Kane

quote: I think every war certainly wears on national will and national patience, particularly a counterinsurgency.
author: Stanley A. McChrystal

quote: I have not the smarts or patience for political office.
author: Henry Rollins

quote: A certain amount of impatience may be useful to stimulate and motivate us to action. However, I believe that a lack of patience is a major cause of the difficulties and unhappiness in the world today.
author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quote: Brad will tell you. He puts a movie on, I'm asleep in 10 minutes. I have no patience. But the kids love action movies with comedy, Jackie Chan and all that.
author: Angelina Jolie

quote: When, President Obama, do you mean to cease abusing our patience? How long is that madness of yours still to mock us? When is there to be an end to that unbridled audacity of yours swaggering about as it does now?
author: Ted Cruz

quote: A healthy male adult bore consumes each year one and a half times his own weight in other people's patience.
author: John Updike

quote: I have no patience for anyone who thinks they've figured things out, no patience for people who think they're right at the expense of everyone else. The world is too connected and too complicated to conform to any of our rigid ideas of what it should be like.
author: Moby

quote: The best thing Jay-Z ever taught me was patience.
author: Rita Ora

quote: Who ever is out of patience is out of possession of their soul.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: I like playing. I wouldn't be a good coach. I don't have the patience to be a coach.
author: Tom Brady

quote: Dating someone on the opposite end of the happy spectrum teaches you an incredible amount of patience.
author: Chris Pine

quote: My advice to someone to follow in my footsteps is to have patience. I've been doing this for twelve years.
author: Christina Milian

quote: It's funny with jeans now, because if they don't feel like a pair of sweatpants, I don't have patience for them anymore! I think I'm becoming increasingly lazy.
author: Claire Danes

quote: There was a solid year and a half, perhaps two years, after making 'Temple Grandin,' when I didn't do anything. I just didn't have much patience for roles that were silly, or light, or inconsequential.
author: Claire Danes

quote: It is necessary for him who would endure existence with patience that he should conceive himself to be something - that he should be persuaded he is not a cipher in the muster-roll of man.
author: William Godwin

quote: No, I wouldn't direct a movie, no. I couldn't. I don't have the patience for it, I don't have the people skills. You have to be clever. I'm not really clever in that kind of way. And you have to be able to manipulate people, but at the same time allow them to feel like they are manipulating you, to get the kind of movie that you want.
author: Nick Cave

quote: Opera is complex for those who perform it, but also for those who listen to it. It takes more time, more patience and more spirit of sacrifice. All this is well worth it because opera offers such deep sensations that they will remain in a heart for a lifetime.
author: Andrea Bocelli

quote: Punk rock has never really had much patience with musical virtuosity. Actually, it'd be more accurate to say that for most of its history, punk has been actively hostile to virtuosity.
author: James Surowiecki

quote: I started 'SNL,' and I became the one who did impressions. I did that, but then I wanted to get an original character on, and that took a long time to get one on that stuck. And then I got Vinny Vedecci on - 'Oh great' - and then it took a couple more seasons to get Greg the Alien on. You have to have some patience.
author: Bill Hader

quote: If you list the qualities that we consider feminine, they are patience, understanding, empathy, supportiveness, a desire to nurture. Our culture tells us those are feminine traits, but they're really just human.
author: Sydney Pollack

quote: Bear patiently with a rival.
author: Ovid

quote: Because of my capacity for listening to strangers' tales, or the details of their lives, my patience with their food and their crotchets, my curiosity that borders on nosiness, I am told that anyone traveling with me experiences an unbelievable tedium, and this is why I choose to travel alone.
author: Paul Theroux

quote: I think patience is a skill and I wish I had it.
author: David Duchovny

quote: I always had that long-term vision. Even getting going with cinema, knowing it was such a long road to be able to make films, but I always had a long term. Whenever I was starting out, I had that patience.
author: Richard Linklater

quote: No one who strives with full faith and heart for the blessings of eternal life will be denied. And how great will be the joy and how much deeper the appreciation then after enduring in patience and faith now.
author: Henry B. Eyring

quote: Let us wait in patience for the Christ-child whose own life depended on the lives of Mary and Joseph. The Word of God was made flesh. He came so that we might experience the fullness of time.
author: Stanley Hauerwas

quote: Temperamentally I'm not a natural producer, because I don't have the patience.
author: Damian Lewis

quote: For some reason, every time I get a little bit under the weather, I've got zero patience.
author: Jason Day

quote: I've got to really try and manage my patience out there.
author: Jason Day

quote: You know, writing is really difficult, and it takes a real patience and a skill. I don't know if I have that. I admire it in others, so much, and I envy it.
author: Adam Scott

quote: I have declared that patience is never more than patient. I too have declared, that I who am not patient am patient.
author: Gertrude Stein

quote: People are stubborn about what they perceive to be the right thing or the wrong thing, and it takes a long time to filter this human condition. There's a waiting period until people catch up. But if you have patience - which it takes when someone thinks differently from you - everybody always catches up. That patience is a wonderful virtue.
author: Johnny Mathis

quote: Golf is all about patience - one tournament is four days long, 18 holes a day.
author: Lindsey Vonn

quote: Patience can be a good thing - but not necessarily. Sometimes it's not so bad to be impatient. I'm a little bit too polite.
author: Helen Mirren

quote: I recall my mum tried to teach me how to fry chicken once, and I almost burned down half the kitchen... I don't think I have the patience for cooking.
author: Ne-Yo

quote: I don't play pyrotechnic scales. I play about frustration, patience, anger. Music is an extension of my soul.
author: Dick Dale

quote: I've been accused of riding roughshod over others' emotions, and I admit, when I feel a friend is being over-indulgent, my patience is in short supply.
author: Mariella Frostrup

quote: If I spent all my time criticising myself, I wouldn't be able to function. There are actors who theorise till the cows come home. I haven't the patience for them. It's maybe shallow, but that's why I'll never be part of the acting set.
author: Anthony Hopkins

quote: I don't really have the patience to do my hair, which is why it's always parted down the middle, slicked, in a low ponytail or a messy high bun. I'm too lazy to do my own hair, but I like doing my makeup.
author: Gigi Hadid

quote: My mother is a ball of fire in the world, and I love that about her. But what I have learned from my stepdad is something as important, which is patience and compassion. Because when you are living with someone else, those two qualities go a long way.
author: Justin Timberlake

quote: Basically, discipline, effort, patience and courage are hugely important core values for kids to grow up embracing.
author: Karen Salmansohn

quote: I would say I'm a boss who's learning, and I hope people have the patience for the fact that I'm learning along the way because that's a tough thing.
author: Sophia Amoruso

quote: I like to take my own time, and I don't like to rush. I do take time, and I have patience.
author: Nargis Fakhri

quote: When I try to be patient on my own, my patience is forced and short-lived. It is obvious to everyone that I am desperately trying to be patient.
author: Mother Angelica

quote: When you are starting to run an online business, you need to narrow down a niche market and be able to stick with it until you have a good profit coming in. This can take a while, so you need to have a great deal of patience to make sure that your business is moving in the right direction.
author: Fabrizio Moreira

quote: When you're short on sleep, you're short on patience. You're ruder to people, less tolerant, less understanding. It's harder to relate and to pay attention for sustained periods of time.
author: Jason Fried

quote: The difference between rearing a child in your 20s and one in your 50s is one of patience.
author: Iman

quote: I would love to write a screenplay for 'Badlands' one day. I don't think I could ever have the patience to do it I don't even have the patience to write songs. I write some of the shortest songs ever because I don't have the patience.
author: Halsey

quote: Being a father has fulfilled me in parts of my life that sustain me. It gives me a comfort and patience. All actors have this hole inside that they're trying to fill by performing. I'm anxious to keep creating, but I'm not so desperate any more because I have the love and support of my kids and wife.
author: John C. Reilly

quote: I was 25 myself once. I also thought I knew everything. I also thought that I could give singers singing advice and comics comedy advice. When you're that age, you know it all, so I understand it. But when you're tired and you don't have patience for it, you definitely snap.
author: Lisa Lampanelli

quote: I'm terrible with patience.
author: Katherine Heigl

quote: Patience is the most necessary quality for business, many a man would rather you heard his story than grant his request.
author: Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield

quote: I don't have a lot of patience for movies that aren't cleanly told.
author: Jon Favreau

quote: I have an equal amount of patience as my grade-school children, which is not great.
author: Mike D

quote: Patience was not my strong point.
author: Lauren Bacall

quote: To anybody who says to me, 'I'm in character,' I say, 'You should be in an asylum.' If you don't know that you're pretending, then you should really seek medical help. I don't have patience for that stuff.
author: D. B. Sweeney

quote: What I relish most is when a member of my staff, who has worked with passion and patience towards achieving their dream of owning a restaurant, walks up to me and says, 'Nobu! I have done it!'
author: Nobu Matsuhisa

quote: Al Unser Sr. was one of the smartest drivers I've ever raced against. And I often said, I wish I could've had some of his patience. I know it would have worked for me many times.
author: Mario Andretti

quote: I wish I had more patience.
author: Toni Collette

quote: I think writing novels has taught me more about the value of patience and being organized. I've learned to use timelines and wikis to track decisions and make sure everything still fits together. It's both easier and harder than writing short fiction.
author: Ken Liu

quote: When you're a crime reporter, you see the nub of what life's about, and you don't have much patience for the falsity of politics.
author: Heather Brooke

quote: To make a full-blooded puff pastry, you need time, you need patience, and you need precision. It's all about the lamination: it's all about building up the layers of butter, dough, butter, dough; as the butter melts, it creates steam, and that brings up the layers of the two doughs apart from each other, and that's what gives it the rise.
author: Paul Hollywood

quote: I have a business manager and a book-keeper who deals with our household bills. My husband and I sit down with her for a weekly report on how much money is going out, but I'm not terribly interested, and I don't have the patience for it.
author: Jane Green

quote: Endurance is the crowning quality, And patience all the passion of great hearts.
author: James Russell Lowell

quote: Patience, discipline - giving everything on court... This is what I'm trying to bring in every single match.
author: Angelique Kerber

quote: TV requires a lot more patience. No one's ever like, 'I gotta get up at 5 A.M. and write my stand-up!' It's an easy life. With 'Silicon Valley,' it's long hours and very unglamorous.
author: Kumail Nanjiani

quote: Let him that hath no power of patience retire within himself, though even there he will have to put up with himself.
author: Baltasar Gracian

quote: I've no patience for people who say they never watch television. It's a great way to keep in touch with popular culture, and it's important that children can relate to what their schoolmates are watching.
author: Terry Wogan

quote: Writing novels is largely about endurance and patience. I take a lot of breaks, hit walls, and go do something else while I think things through. But I do it every day, and I try to treat it as a job, something that is not dictated by whimsy or muses.
author: Adam Mansbach

quote: Science is to be much commended for the ingenuity, the patience, and the persistency it displays in the invention of instruments wherewith to ferret out the secrets of nature.
author: Max Heindel

quote: I believe there's too little patience and context to many of the investigations I read or see on television.
author: Bob Woodward

quote: You have to have patience to be a legislator.
author: Gene Green
